  • Home
  • Return Center
  • Return to Store

Here’s everything you need to know about returning your item(s)

Conveniently return your item to store following the instructions below.

Since you would like to return to store:

Policy

Most unopened and unused items can be returned within 90 days of purchase for a refund or exchange. Some items may have different policies associated with them. Click here for a list of exceptions to our 90 day policy.

Items must be returned, in new, unused condition, and in its original packaging, and with all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Items with Specific Return Requirements

Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund. If the packages have been opened, the items may only be exchanged for the identical items or titles.

Valid Driver's License

or

State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Exceptions

See Vendors List

Requirements

We have a "no quibble" policy when it comes to recalls. When a product is recalled, we believe the most important thing is to get that product out of children's hands.

  • Toys"R"Us and Babies"R"Us stores will take back recalled products sold at a Toys"R"Us or Babies"R"Us store or our e-commerce sites at any point during the recall period.

There are some exceptions to this policy, please check with your local store for more details.

What to expect:

No receipt or proof of purchase is necessary to return a recalled product to one of our stores.

If you do not have a receipt, you will receive a store credit for the lowest sale price of the product within the last 30 days.

Valid ID Required

To ensure that we can provide a fair return policy and service to our customers, one of the below valid forms of ID is required:

  • Valid Driver's License
  • State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Shipping costs are not refunded for online returns.

Here’s everything you need to know about returning your item(s)

Conveniently return your item to store following the instructions below.

Since you would like to return to store:

Policy

Most unopened and unused items can be returned within 90 days of purchase for a refund or exchange. Some items may have different policies associated with them. Click here for a list of exceptions to our 90 day policy.

Items must be returned, in new, unused condition, and in its original packaging, and with all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Items with Specific Return Requirements

Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund. If the packages have been opened, the items may only be exchanged for the identical items or titles.

Valid Driver's License

or

State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Exceptions

See Vendors List

Requirements

Return your item to any TRU/BRU store for a free, quick, and convenient return or exchange.

If your item was broken/damaged, or defective, please be sure to mention this to the store customer service when returning the item.

Online Purchase

  • For optimal service please have the packing slip that came with the order and include all original packaging and all items/parts that came with the purchase.

Store Purchase

  • Return with original receipt or gift receipt.
  • To ensure that we can provide a fair return policy and service to our customers, please bring a valid form of ID.
  • If you do not have a receipt when returning an item to a TRU/BRU store that was purchased in store the refund will be provided in the form of a store credit/gift card.

Pay In Store Purchase

  • Bring the store receipt from the Pay in Store purchase.

What to expect:

Returns made in store accompanied with a proof of purchase (receipt, packing slip, gift receipt) will be refunded in the following manner: If original payment was made by: Refund will be given in:

Payment Method Refund Method
Cash Cash
Charge Card Credit to Charge Card
Check, within the last 7 days Merchandise Credit
Checks, after 7 days Cash
Merchandise Credit Merchandise Credit
Debit Card Cash

Valid ID Required

To ensure that we can provide a fair return policy and service to our customers, one of the below valid forms of ID is required:

  • Valid Driver's License
  • State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Shipping costs are not refunded for online returns.

Here’s everything you need to know about returning your item(s)

Conveniently return your item to store following the instructions below.

Since you would like to return to store:

Policy

  • Most unopened and unused items can be returned within 90 days of purchase for a refund or exchange. Some items may have different policies associated with them. Click here for a list of exceptions to our 90 day policy.
  • Items must be returned, in new, unused condition, and in its original packaging, and with all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Items with Specific Return Requirements

  • Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund. If the packages have been opened, the items may only be exchanged for the identical items or titles.

Valid Driver's License

or

State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Exceptions

See Vendors List

Requirements

Return your item to any TRU/BRU store for a free, quick, and convenient return or exchange.

Online Purchase

  • For optimal service please have the packing slip that came with the order and include all original packaging and all items/parts that came with the purchase.

Store Purchase

  • Return with original receipt or gift receipt.
  • To ensure that we can provide a fair return policy and service to our customers, please bring a valid form of ID.
  • If you do not have a receipt when returning an item to a TRU/BRU store that was purchased in store the refund will be provided in the form of a store credit/gift card.

Return an item off a Registry

We will gladly accept returns up to 12 months from your event due date in any TRU/BRU store

  • Please have a valid driver’s license or other valid form of ID. Click here to see other valid forms of ID.
  • Please bring any available gift receipts to receive a merchandise credit/gift card.

Store Pickup/Family & Friends Pickup return policy (Buy Online, pick up in store)

  • Store Pickup and Family & Friends Pickup orders are subject to the same return policies as purchases made online or in stores.
  • Store Pickup orders may ONLY be returned to a Toys"R"Us or Babies"R"Us store location
  • Please bring your Ready for Pickup Email for any returns of items purchased through the Store Pick up or Family & Friends Pickup programs. This email serves as your receipt and will be needed for any/all returns of merchandise made on your Store Pickup order.

Pay In Store Purchase

  • Bring the store receipt from the Pay in Store purchase.

What to expect:

Returns made in store accompanied with a proof of purchase (receipt, packing slip, gift receipt) will be refunded in the following manner: If original payment was made by: Refund will be given in:

Payment Method Refund Method
Cash Cash
Charge Card Credit to Charge Card
Check, within the last 7 days Merchandise Credit
Checks, after 7 days Cash
Merchandise Credit Merchandise Credit
Debit Card Cash

Registry Return Refund

If you do not have a receipt or gift receipt

  • A merchandise credit/gift card will be given after validating:

    • The baby registry is 1 year old or less from the event date.
    • The baby registry from which the item was purchased can be retrieved using the "Registry Number' or "Registrant Name" through the store's register.

Store Pickup Refund

  • Your instore pickup return will be credited back to the original form of purchase.
  • If a gift card was used to make the purchase online then the refund will be provided in the form of a store gift card.
  • If both a credit cardand gift card was used, the refund amount will be provided back split appropriately between each form of payment.

Gift Returns

  • Gift Returns made at any of our Toys"R"Us or Babies"R"Us store locations will receive a merchandise credit when accompanied by a gift receipt or online packing slip.

Return Item Where Free Gift Card Was Received With Purchase

If you received a free gift card or free merchandise with your purchase, the value of the free gift card or free merchandise will be deducted from your refund amount unless you return the free gift card unused or the free merchandise in new, unused condition and in original packaging.

If the free gift card or free merchandise came with the purchase of multiple qualifying items, your receipt will show the amount of each item attributable to the free gift card or free merchandise, and your return will be reduced by that amount unless you return the free gift card unused or the free merchandise in new, unused condition and in original packaging.

If purchasing an item makes you eligible for a discount on other merchandise, the amount of the discount will be deducted from the return value of the item unless you return that other merchandise in new, unused condition and in original packaging as well

Valid ID Required

To ensure that we can provide a fair return policy and service to our customers, one of the below valid forms of ID is required:

  • Valid Driver's License
  • State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Shipping costs are not refunded for online returns.

Return Policy

Most unopened and unused items can be returned within 90 days of purchase for a refund or exchance. Some items mau have different policies associated with them. Click here for a list of exceptions to our 90 day policy. Items must be returned, in new, unsused condition, and in its original packaging, and wiht all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Exceptions: See Vendors List

Items with Specific Return Requirements

Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund. If the packages have been opened, the items may only be exchanged for the identical items or titles.
